concepts.definition: The naming system is used to define concepts and symbols to represent those concepts; e.g. UCUM, LOINC, NDC code, local lab codes, etc.
The naming system is used to manage identifiers (e.g. license numbers, order numbers, etc.).
The naming system is used as the root for other identifiers and naming systems.

valueset.name: NamingSystemType
valueset.description: Identifies the purpose of the naming system.
